title: Karachi Electric Supply Corporation (Removal from Service) Ordinance, 1999
title_en: Karachi Electric Supply Corporation (Removal from Service) Ordinance, 1999
description: Official consolidated text of Karachi Electric Supply Corporation (Removal from Service) Ordinance, 1999 (XVII of 1999) published by The Pakistan Code (Service Laws).

provisions.title: Section 2. Removal of certain persons from service, etc
provisions.content:
THE KARACHI ELECTRIC SUPPLY CORPORATION (REMOVAL FROM
SERVICE) ORDINANCE, 1999
1
ORDINANCE NO. XVII OF 1999
[24th September, 1999]
An Ordinance to provide for removal from service of the Karachi Electric Supply Corporation
WHEREAS it is expedient to provide for removal from the service of the Karachi Electric
Supply Corporation for the purpose hereinafter appearing;
AND WHEREAS the National Assembly is not in session and the President is satisfied that
circumstances exist which render it necessary to take immediate action;
NOW, THEREFORE, in exercise of the powers conferred by clause (1) of Article 89 of the
Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, the President is pleased to make and promulgate the
following Ordinance ;â€”

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement
provisions.content:
(1) This Ordinance may be called the Karachi Electric
Supply Corporation (Removal from Service) Ordinance, 1999.
(2) It shall come into force at once.
